member.name: T:ClassLibraryTicketSystem.Car
member.summary: Represents a vehicle of type: Car

member.name: M:ClassLibraryTicketSystem.Car.#ctor(System.String,System.DateTime,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Use this constructor to create a new car.
member.param: License plate of the used vehicle.
Set "true" if a Brobizz is used. Set "false" or "null" if no Brobizz is used.

member.name: P:ClassLibraryTicketSystem.Car.TicketPrice
member.summary: Use this property to specify the ticket price for this vehicle type.

member.name: T:ClassLibraryTicketSystem.MC
member.summary: Represents a vehicle of type: Motorcycle

member.name: M:ClassLibraryTicketSystem.MC.#ctor(System.String,System.DateTime,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Use this constructor to create a new motorcycle.
member.param: License plate of the used vehicle.
Set "true" if a Brobizz is used. Set "false" or "null" if no Brobizz is used.

member.name: P:ClassLibraryTicketSystem.MC.TicketPrice
member.summary: Use this property to specify the ticket price for this vehicle type.

member.name: T:ClassLibraryTicketSystem.Vehicle
member.summary: This class is used as base class for different vehicle types.

member.name: M:ClassLibraryTicketSystem.Vehicle.#ctor(System.String,System.DateTime,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Use this constructor to create a new vehicle.
member.param: License plate of the used vehicle.
Set "true" if a Brobizz is used. Set "false" or "null" if no Brobizz is used.

member.name: P:ClassLibraryTicketSystem.Vehicle.HasBrobizz
member.summary: This property indicates if a Brobizz was used to buy the ticket.

member.name: P:ClassLibraryTicketSystem.Vehicle.LicensePlate
member.summary: The license number plate of the vehicle used. Maximum allowed length of 7 characters. Throws ArgumentException if longer than 7 characters.

member.name: P:ClassLibraryTicketSystem.Vehicle.Date
member.summary: The date and time of the ticket purchase with this vehicle.

member.name: P:ClassLibraryTicketSystem.Vehicle.TicketPrice
member.summary: This property provides the standard ticket price for this vehicle type.

member.name: M:ClassLibraryTicketSystem.Vehicle.Price
member.summary: Method to retrieve the ticket price for this vehicle. If a Brobizz was used, the discount will be included in the returned value.

member.name: M:ClassLibraryTicketSystem.Vehicle.VehicleType
member.summary: Method to retrieve the vehicle type.

member.name: M:ClassLibraryTicketSystem.Vehicle.ToString
member.returns: Vehicle type, License plate, Date, Price, BroBizz usage
